briefTitle: Reducing Bacteria That Cause Tooth Decay

outcomeMeasures.title: Microbial Levels
outcomeMeasures.description: The CRTÂ® Bacteria (Ivoclar Vivadent) saliva sample test is done on culture media that is specific for S. mutans and Lactobacillus. After incubation for 3 days the colonies are compared to photographic standards.
